name: Lava Man (Bleary_Deer, jfcbooth)
description:
Help an 'esteamed' Lava Man run from the steam lava flowing out of Mount Steam into his safe bunker. Try to survive for as long as you can to get the highest score!

Controls:

  • WASD - move
  • Esc -Pause
  • Space - Jump

jfcbooth--Level Designer, Game Engineer--https://jfcbooth.itch.io/; Bleary_Deer--Artist, Sound Designer--Bleary_Deer - itch.io
